document_data.mainbody:
potion of extra-healing or potion of cure critical woundsThe potions might not necessarily be the same, but making the assumption the potion of cure critical wounds has the same effect as the spell, then it has an identical effect to the potion of extra-healing in the editions where the latter exists. Thus, the assumption is made that the potion of cure critical wounds is the same as the potion of extra-healing. was a magical liquid that provided a great deal of healing magic when consumed.
These potions could be consumed as a whole or in thirds, but drinking the entire potion at once provided slightly more healing magic.
Tessaril Winter, the warrior and wizard of Eveningstar, carried some potions of extra-healing.
